changelog:
⚙️ *Changelog v1.8*

✅ Fixed: Menu buttons not responding properly
✅ Fixed: Command listing errors in menu & allmenu
➕ Added: Forks counter (replaces Daily Users)
➕ Added: New `owner` command with fake Meta AI vCard
➕ Added: `allmenu` command with improved layout
➕ Added: Updated `alive` & `arise` commands (new style)
🧠 Improved: Command categorization & handler compatibility
🚀 Optimized: Menu performance and stability

📝 Update recommended to ensure full feature compatibility!
